name: TROLLESTER
description:
I created this game for Oktrollberfest 2021. This is a fun to play game. I am sure you would like this prototype.
I am sorry because this game is not completed fully. I find out about this game jam yesterday and I like the theme of this Jam about trolling others, so I created this game but till now I am only able to make 1 level if people like it i would make more levels.
Motive- TROLL Your friends and have Fun !!!!!
